name: Long Sleeve Shirts and Large Bags - All $15
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLACING ORDER!

Due to the growing interest in orders, the fact that everything is one of a kind, and the other fact that we cannot currently upgrade our site to tell you when things are sold out, before you place an order, we ABSOLUTELY NEED you to do the following:

1. email us at thingswemakewithourhands@gmail.com and inform us of the EXACT item/items you want.

2. we will then email you back giving you the go ahead to place your order, or let you know if we have already sold the items you're looking for, and if so, when that item may be available again for you to purchase.

3. then come back to this site, and place your order, and we will get it out to you as soon as possible.  

THANK YOU SO MUCH!  this will help us help you!



This is where we will feature all of our long sleeve shirts, hoodies, and large bags!  Everything you see here is only $15!

There is only ONE ITEM per picture, everything is one of a kind, and we will be adding new items every week as we sell the items we have posted.  Purchase quickly, next time you look, the item you may be looking for could be gone!

If there is something you see that you would like in a different size, different color, or a request to make something that you once saw, but do not see anymore, please email us at thingswemakewithourhands@gmail.com

Thank you!
